item.title: Cisco Ssh Error
item.author: Author
item.description: cisco ssh error When you met error like this: 1 2 ssh cisco@10.32.3.1 Unable to negotiate with 10.32.3.1 port 22: no matching key exchange method found. Their offer: diffie-hellman-group1-sha1 Solution: 1 $ ssh -l <USERNAME> -oHostKeyAlgorithms=+ssh-dss -oKexAlgorithms=+diffie-hellman-group1-sha1 <HOST> or 1 ssh -l <username> -o HostKeyAlgorithms=+ssh-dss -o KexAlgorithms=+diffie-hellman-group1-sha1 -c 3des-cbc <hostname> Reference SSH failed on 3750 switch SSH Not Working After Update To 10.
